string.value: A throne fit for the world's greatest kings... which means it's JUST good enough for a BigWig.\nRecovers 100 HP, 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: How does a Demon Slayer celebrate a birthday? Do they even have them? 100 HP and 50 MP restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enjoy a special performance by the one and only Mercedes! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this chair to become more beautiful with Hilla! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this drill machine chair to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this Mini Shinsoo chair to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Everybody's a billionaire in this chair! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: They're seriously fun guys! They are also fungi. That was the joke. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a little on the hot side, but at least it comes with a wicked red dragon! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a little on the cold side, but at least it comes with a wicked blue dragon! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Let's fool around with a cat next to a fan. Because, why not? Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll feel like you own a tiny island! Only you won't. You'll own a chair. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Smells a whole lot like sweat and cotton candy... MAGIC! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Filled with refreshing fruit, guaranteed to soak your bottom! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You're going to get a little wet and you'll probably be covered in fur. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: All the cool dragons are wearing black these days. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You just feel so much smarter than everybody else. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely chair for lovely couples. Lonely people may also sit in it, but it won't be fun. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Is it just me, or is it sleepy in here? Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It said it would return the day after tomorrow with rice cakes. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with an overwhelming stare. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gives lousy hugs, but you get what you pay for. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A truly devilish sheep. Napping not advised. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Girl gamers are real, and theyâ€™re made of marshmallows, and they smell like unicorns. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Just hooâ€™in around. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The chair isnâ€™t made of skin, but it sure is nice on yours! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drowse among the baby birds without a worry. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Makes you feel clean. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Whatâ€™s better than recreating that time you broke your spine in half at band camp? Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: FINALLY, you can be Elize's best friend. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is the cracked egg that recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds, if your butt is in the right place.

string.name: desc
string.value: A swing that is moved by a baby dragon. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Challenge the limits of your nerves. You could get high-fived at any moment! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Things are going so well! Nothing could possibly go wrong! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hop into the egg basket with a chubby rabbit! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Oh my gosh, did you see how cute she was?!! I THINK SHE TOUCHED MY HAND! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You just feel so much smarter than everybody else. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely chair for lovely couples. Lonely people may also sit in it, but it won't be fun. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Even Magnus gets lonely sometimes. Say anything, and Magnus will always answer. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A luxurious toilet chair. Don't forget to put the seat down! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair created to celebrate Halloween. Sit on it to recover 50 HP every 10 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: It said it would return the day after tomorrow with rice cakes. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Makes you feel clean. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: For when you need to swing a baby dragon, which obviously happens a lot. Recovers 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Baseball is finally fun with Orchid and Lotus on your team! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair created to celebrate Halloween. Sit on it to recover 50 HP every 10 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Now you know what the Miwok Boys have been going through. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fall deep into the calm of the jungle with the future of the Miwok Village. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: The Old and the Wise Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Sitting next to the elder is always a little awkward. Sit and recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seceonds.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Anyone who isn't us is our enemy. Recovery 200 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Positively pimpin'. Recovery 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: A good king knows when to save his strength and when to destroy his enemies. Recovery 100 HP and 200 MP every 10 seconds.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Everybody on Southperry.net knows that a Mapler's best friend is a giant fluffy Chinchilla; mostly because it doubles a pillow between adventures.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in Moon Chair in the early evenings while the Moon is up, 60 HP and 60 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sink yourself into this heavenly cake chair next to someone else who owns it as well, and watch it create a scrumptious effect! Mmm, this chair is so delicious you'll recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yummy! Use this chair next to someone else who's also using it, and a mouth-watering chocolate fondue appears. Smack your lips and dream about treats as you recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enjoy the cherry blossoms wherever you go! If you sit next to someone else in the same chair, you'll get a special effect to enjoy together. Restores 30 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc

A mysterious stone infused with the power of the aliens. If you insert it into an item's open socket, the stats of the alien stone will be added to the item.

string.name: desc
string.value: EXP Buff for purchasers of the Maple Basic Value Pack. EXP increases will remain in effect while the Value Pack is active, and only up to Lv. 100.\n#cLv. 1 - 29: EXP +50% \n Lv. 30 - 100: EXP +20%#

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value:
He might not look like much, but he's had enough practice to rate as an expert porter.#c
Speed: 10
Jump: 5
Weight: 10

string.name: desc
string.value:
This beefy fellow is specialized in heavy lifting. He'll move anything you need moved, just not very fast.#c
Speed: 5
Jump: 5
Weight: 20

string.name: desc
string.value:
The desert routes are this dancer's routine. She flows through the dunes with enviable speed.#c
Speed: 20
Jump: 5
Weight: 10

string.name: desc
string.value:
This warrior knows where bandits lurk to ambush unwary merchants.#c
Speed: 10
Jump: 5
Weight: 15
Robber Encounters: -10%
Goods Stolen: -10%

string.name: desc
string.value:
This little critter might look cute, but he lifts heavy loads with ease and grace.#c
Speed: 15
Jump: 5
Weight: 25

string.name: desc
string.value:
A frog-drawn cart. Frogs are quite agile, but weaken in dry desert climates.#c
Speed: 70
Jump: 90
Weight: 10

string.name: desc
string.value:
With their impressively sturdy legs, ostriches can easily rush a cart along.#c
Speed: 80
Jump: 90
Weight: 20

string.name: desc
string.value:
A camel is called the Ship of the Desert. They are indispensable companions to desert merchants.#c
Speed: 90
Jump: 90
Weight: 30

string.name: desc
string.value: A candle used on the birthday cake for the 4th anniversary of Maplestory. The flame will be blown out when the player exits the game and lit again upon returning to the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: A memory chip Agent W left with me. Information regarding 'Master M' is said to be contained in it. If I don't enter the secret code every hour, it will self-destruct.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mr. Oh sells these rare spices at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can find these memorabilia from Thailand at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lena sells delicious unagi at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: This taxydermy shark, handmade by Tae Gong himself, can be found at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hanako sells this exquisite at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Giant Star that Cassandra made for you. If you hold it during the Starlight Festival, you can receive 1 Star Stamp every hour. \n#cDisappears when you log out of the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: Entrance Level: Lv. 70 or above\nRecommended Level: Lv. 70 - Lv. 89

string.name: desc
string.value: Entrance Level: Lv. 90 or above\nRecommended Level: Lv. 90 - Lv. 119

string.name: desc
string.value: An unknown being that has yet to be explained.

string.name: desc
string.value: A solid ice crystal that contains Maha Charm. Hold onto it for one hour and the crystal will melt, enabling you to acquire the Charm.

string.name: desc
string.value: A charm that contains protection from Maha, the spirit of Polearm. Take this to Cassandra for a chance to answer questions and receive prizes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small candle given by Cassandra. This candle will turn off automatically when the game ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box with Cassandra's PC Cafe Giant Star. Stay online with this for 90 minutes to transform it into Cassandra's PC Cafe Giant Star. Disappears when you log out.

string.name: desc
string.value: PC Cafe Giant Star that Cassandra is looking for. Disappears when you log out.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold onto this for 30 minutes and the cold weather will turn it into slush. It's so delicate it will disappear if you log out.

string.name: desc
string.value: Give it to Cassandra before it disappears!

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon Egg that Cassandra has left in your care. You must hold it close and keep it warm for one hour for it to hatch. Logging out will cause it to be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon that hatched from the egg Cassandra left with you. Return it to Cassandra to receive a reward!

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty compass that will eventually be used to make a Golden Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black feather from a bird that has not been identified. Keep an eye on it for 15 minutes and it will transform into a Bright Feather.\n#cIt will disappear once you log out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A bright feather from a bird that has not been identified. Take it over to the Maple Admin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A large star specially made to commemorate MapleStory's 6th anniversary. Carry it with you for 45 minutes to receive a Star Stamp.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Hawkeye sticker. Collect all 5 Cygnus Knights stickers to receive a limited reward.

string.name: desc
string.value: It takes 2 hours for the sand in Carta's Sandglass to trickle down to the bottom.

string.name: desc
string.value: The sand in Carta's Sandglass has trickled down to the bottom.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Maple Admin will exchange 9 of these for a random chocolate.

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain a special item by summoning the Dragon Lord after collecting all 9 types of chocolates.

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain a special item by summoning the Dragon Lord after collecting all 9 types of chocolates.

string.name: desc
string.value: An Oz sticker. Collect all 5 Cygnus Knights stickers to receive a limited reward.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tasty Han Gwa made of baked rice crackers and syrup. Take this to the Maple Administrator.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you log in everyday and play for an hour, You can upgrade the stat of evolving ring everyday. If you log out before one hour, you will need to come back to Gaga and stay for an hour again to upgrade your ring.

string.name: desc
string.value: By bringing this potion to Gaga, the player will be able to upgrade the Evolving Ring's stats.

string.name: desc
string.value: The hot Stone that Cassandra requested. It absorbs the carrier's body heat and gets warmer and warmer. Carry it with you for a set time to receive a Star Stamp.

string.name: desc
string.value: A little four-leaf clover that sparkles with yellow. It will turn into green four-leaf clover in time.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fresh green four-leaf clover. They say four-leaf clovers are lucky.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fabulous combination of a white hoodie and popular baggy jeans.

string.name: desc
string.value: Beautiful wings to go along with your blue jeans.

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete your look with the Rainbow Bangle!

string.name: desc
string.value: A chaplain hat in a beautiful shade of pink.

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks like big city style with this outfit!

string.name: desc
string.value: A highly-desired combination of white and blue.

string.name: desc
string.value: A must have item for protecting your skin against the warm sun of springtime.

string.name: desc
string.value: Wear it in springtime, and you'll feel light as a feather!

string.value: A doll shaped like a shining sun. So bright!

string.name: desc
string.value: This assortment of freshly sliced fruit is sure to make your Special Sundae that much more special!

string.name: desc
string.value: Think your Special Sundae is cool enough? Think again! Add some shredded ice to make your sundae even more refreshing!

string.name: desc
string.value: Pour this light, sweet liquid over your Special Sundae, and then prepare yourself for a sugary taste explosion!

string.name: desc
string.value: The first piece of the Pirate King's treasure map.

string.name: desc
string.value: The second piece of the Pirate King's treasure map.

string.name: desc
string.value: The third piece of the Pirate King's treasure map.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shiny charm from Gaga. When held by a Cannoneer, the area surrounding their monkey will glow.\n#cClick to turn On/Off.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A monkey doll that Gaga lost. Collect 30 and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shiny monkey charm. When held by a Cannoneer, the area surrounding their monkey will glow.\n#cClick to turn On/Off.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a 3000 Days Commemorative Stamp to celebrate Maple's 3000-day anniversary. Collect 3000 to obtain a 3000-Day Medal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Juicy red strawberries for making Strawberry Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet melon for making Melon Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tasty kiwi for making Kiwi Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A plump pineapple for making Pineapple Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Syrup for sweetening fruit juice. Keep it for 30 minutes, and it may develop a legendary taste...

string.name: desc
string.value: A fully matured maple syrup, featuring a bold, complex flavor unlike any other.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lamp spoken of in legends past. Keep the light on for 50 minutes to receive a Legends Coin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A star stone that contains energy from all the green stars in space. Place it in your Set-up window and fill up your gauge to activate the Going Green skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: A device that measures the amount of Good Vibe in Maple World. Keep it in your Set-up window for 30 minutes to complete the measurement.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Good Vibe Detector that has completed its measurement. The blinking light means it's done.

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-cooked chicken drumstick. It is both tasty and nutritious.

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-cooked chicken drumstick. It is both tasty and nutritious.

string.name: desc
string.value: An emblem worn by the commanders under the Black Mage. Their origin and full meaning are unknown.

string.name: desc
string.value: A symbol of Waikiki. Just looking at it makes you dream of the beach.

string.name: desc
string.value: An igloo, partially melted by the sun. Hold it for 30 minutes without logging out, and it may return to its legendary form...

string.name: desc
string.value: The legendary igloo. Gaze at it, and feel the howling winds of Alaska!

string.name: desc
string.value: A recorder that can be used to record nearby noises. It can record for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A completed recorder that has reached its 30-minute capacity. The recorded noise can be used to make sounds that monsters hate.

string.name: desc
string.value: A yummy roasted turkey you remember enjoying during Thanksgiving.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maple Leaf that pulsates with a golden aura.

string.name: desc
string.value: A good looking monkey doll. If you look closely, you might think that this monkey looks like a celebrity.

string.name: desc
string.value: A commemorative stamp that was made with the support of many Maplers.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal of stars that only have filled with the memory of blue stars that exist in the outer space.

string.name: desc
string.value: A dirty piece of trash. You should pick it up to keep this Maple World a cleaner place! Just wash your hands afterwards.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Totally Cool Melon that can be a material to make a tasty Melon juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: You put the rain-soaked Fireworks in the Magic Powder. Now they will dry out in about 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Thanks to the Magic Powder, these Fireworks are completely dry and ready to use! Take these to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old and faded photograph of someone.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old and worn out hankerchief. You can't even tell its original color.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bizarre device that might lead you to Cassandra's first love. Have this in your Set-up window for 30 minutes to get results.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Love Detector that has turned something up. Take this to Gaga and show him the results.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Golden Hammer 50%. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Special Potential Scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Clean Slate Scroll 10%. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for an Advanced Equip Enhancement Scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for an Armor Attack/Magic scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Weapon Scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Armor Stats Scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Mochi Ice Cream Chair. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Song Pyun made of Rice Flour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Song Pyun made of Rice Flour and Mugworts Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Song Pyun made of Rice Flour and Red Mango Syrup.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Song Pyun made of Rice Flour and Gardenia Extract.

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty glass bottle that can hold moonlight. Hold it for 30 minutes and then close it.

string.name: desc
string.value: You closed the bottle after 30 minutes just like Gaga told you. Do you see moonlight in the bottle? Well, deliver it to Gaga anyway.

string.name: desc
string.value: A timer Cassandra gave you. The display appears to be broken. Better keep it for 1 hour anyways.

string.name: desc
string.value: A timer Cassandra gave you. It shows 60 min. 00 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broken piece of a crayon obtained from the Monster Park. You might be able to combine it more pieces to make a working crayon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broken piece of a crayon obtained from a Party Quest. You might be able to combine it with more pieces to make a working crayon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broken piece of a crayon obtained from monsters. You might be able to combine it with more pieces.

string.name: name
string.value: Marble That Evolves Into A Belt After 30 Minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gold Richie gave you this item, claiming he has absolutely no idea what it is. Make sure you leave more than 1 slot empty in your EQUIP inventory after 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: After 1 hour the gem changes into an item that can be used to upgrade the Evolving Belt. Make sure you leave more than 1 slot empty in your USE inventory after 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key to open a cage where the little Miwok Boy is locked up. #cClick# on the cage with this key in your inventory.

string.name: desc
string.value: A yummy rice roll made of many tasty ingredients.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious piece of chicken, smothered in a red spicy sauce.

string.name: desc
string.value: A carbonated drink that refreshes completely. Experience the sparkling taste!

string.name: desc
string.value: A fiery red rice cake. It's so spicy!

string.name: desc
string.value: A sports drink that gets absorbed faster than water.

string.name: desc
string.value: A frozen sports drink which gets absorbed way faster than water. It's so cold!

string.name: desc
string.value: Miraculous garlic. Eating only this for 100 straight days will turn a tiger into a human.

string.name: desc
string.value: A young mugwort with miraculous power. Patiently holding it for an hour will turn this young mugworth into a fully-grown mugworth.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red maple leaf pressed inside a book. This sure brings back memories. Pressing it for 3 or 4 hours will dry it, making it a perfect bookmark. \n#cIt disappears if you log out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Entrance Level: Lv. 120 or above\nRecommended Level: Lv. 120

string.name: desc
string.value: Cheerleading pom-poms used to cheer your team. Having them allows you to buff up every 30 minutes.\n#cDisappears if you log out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A device that will send you shooting through time. Its built in temporal interference dampener makes sure you don't ruin the timeline.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small pocket watch given to people returning to Maple World. Seems like this watch runs faster than other watches.\n#cHaving it allows you to gain 10% bonus EXP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Halloween pumpkin lantern that can be use to decorate the magical Halloween tree. #cUse the Halloween Teleport Rock with a Halloween related equipment equipped in order move to where the tree is growing so that you can use the lantern.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Fills you up with crazy Halloween magic. Increases EXP based on level.

string.name: desc
string.value: Blissful tasting Halloween Candy. Quickly collect 50 to calm the ghosts.

string.name: desc
string.value: An engraved key obtained from the Guest Room. What mysterious door does it open?

string.name: desc
string.value: An engraved key obtained from the Haunted Mansion Library. What could it be used for?

string.name: desc
string.value: An engraved key obtained from the Haunted Mansion Pumpkin Field. What could it be used for?

string.name: desc
string.value: An engraved key obtained from the Haunted Mansion Messed Up Center Hall. What could it be used for?

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful golden ornament to decorate the town with for the Legends Awards. Gather them up and bring them to Gaga.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Fireworks to light up the night of the Legends Awards. Gather them up and bring them to Gaga.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Glass Marbles that will be used to decorate the town during the Legends Awards. Gather them up and bring them to Gaga.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Shiny Light Bulbs that will be used to decorate the town during the Legends Awards. Gather them up and bring them to Gaga.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: A flashy button that Maple Claws is looking for. Gather up 100 of them and bring them to Maple Claws.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: A trophy given to the Rock-Paper-Scissors Master. Very prestigious.

string.name: desc
string.value: A trophy given to a Great Protector who completes all 10 days of training.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shiny, gilded statue that belongs to Cassandra. It is remarkably ugly...you just want to get as far away from it as possible...

string.name: desc
string.value: A shiny, gilded statue that belongs to Cassandra. It is remarkably ugly...you just want to get as far away from it as possible...

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious stone that pulses with power. Grants the Great Fortitude skill once the gauge is charged. Charge it up by hunting monsters in certain hunting grounds with this stone in your Set-Up Inventory.

string.name: desc
string.value: A very Christmasy seal. You can exchange 100 of these for one Renegade Coin from Cassandra in the town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gooey lump of chocolate. Hold on it for 30 minutes to turn it into a beautiful Heart Chocolate.

string.name: desc
string.value: Made by holding on to Melted Chocolate for 30 minutes. Bring it to Inkwell!

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful force formed by a strong and righteous hero.

string.name: desc
string.value: A yummy roasted turkey you remember enjoying during Thanksgiving.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone imbued with the power of the Knights of Virtue.

string.name: desc
string.value: The best Premium Special Sundae ever!

string.name: desc
string.value: Black Dragon Crystal that's full of the dragon's energy. You can exchange 100 of these for 1 Tempest Coin from Cassandra in the town.

string.name: name
string.value: Rice Cake for Rice Cake Soup

string.name: desc
string.value: Rice cake for rice cake soup for New Year's.

string.name: desc
string.value: Met garnish for rice cake soup for New Year's.

string.name: desc
string.value: Egg garnish for rice cake soup for New Year's.

string.name: desc
string.value: A wish-granting dragon crystal. Maybe your wish will come true if you stay online after leaving this in your Set-Up window...?

string.name: desc
string.value: A radiant dragon crystal filled with wishes! These wishes will come true!

string.value: A wish-granting dragon crystal. Maybe your wish will come true if you stay online after leaving this in your Set-Up window...?

string.value: A radiant dragon crystal filled with wishes! These wishes will come true!

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweet chocolate perfect for Valentine's Day. You can exchange 100 of these for 1 Valentine's Day Box from Cassandra in the town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Valentine's Day chocolate where you can write a message of love on. Keep it in the Set-up tab for 30 minutes and your feelings just might reach that special someone!

string.name: desc
string.value: Valentine's Day Chocolate with message of love! Take it to Cassandra, the messenger of love, and your feelings WILL reach out to that special someone!

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks like a beautiful spring flower. Hold on to it for 30 minute and enjoy the spring breeze to receive a Star Stamp from Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: Colored sugar that glitters beautifully. Used to make homemade sugar.

string.name: desc
string.value: Crystal Ball that Cassandra entrusted to you. Hold on to it for 30 minutes to see your fortune for this year in the relationship department.

string.name: desc
string.value: This one is sparkling with fountains of lovely fortunes. Bring it to Cassandra to hear your fortune on *wink wink*.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicate brush used to color Easter Eggs.\r\nKeep it in your Inventory Set-up tab for 30 minutes to receive a Shiny Easter Egg Buff.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: It's nice and shiny, but it still needs a bit more work. Try making it even fancier!\r\nKeep it in your Inventory Set-up tab for 30 minutes to receive a Shiny Easter Egg Buff.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone containing the power of Virtue. The stone absorbs power every time you strike a monster. When the stone is full, you can use the basic attack key to use Virtue's Blessing, which lasts for 1 hour and can be stacked with other buffs.\r\n#cWhile Virtue's Blessing is in effect, the stone will no longer absorb power. The strength of the blessing will also increase when you reach Level 31 and Level 71.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A dirty camera that contains memories of Zakum... and much more.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lifts hot-air balloons off the ground! What did you expect?

string.name: desc
string.value: This thing will find ANYTHING... whether you want it to or not.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old map of the excavation site that you probably saw in the Gonzo Gallery.

string.name: desc
string.value: A compass that's essential for pin-pointing artifact locations.

string.name: desc
string.value: Spiegelmann's mustache comb. Having a well-groomed moustache is supposed to raise your chances of finding artifacts...

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a permanent marker. It marks things... permanently.

string.name: desc
string.value: Eye drops for Spiegelmann's wrinkly old eyeballs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dice used during the 8th Anniversary Event. You can throw as many dice as you have in the Set-up tab for the board game.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift wrapping paper that Inkwell is looking for. Use this to make awesome-looking gifts!

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift wrapping string that Inkwell is looking for. Use this to make awesome-looking gifts!

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweet cream needed to make 8th Anniversary cake.

string.name: desc
string.value: Smooth castella needed to make 8th Anniversary cake.

string.name: desc
string.value: Idolman Gold Maple Leaf that will help you earn more points on a live 8th Anniversary M Pop Star performance stage.

string.name: desc
string.value: 8th Anniversary cake box. It can make just about any cake look more delicious!

string.name: desc
string.value: Sandwich with various fillings. You can drag this to put it in the Picnic Basket.

string.name: desc
string.value: A carbonated drink with a kick. You can drag this to put it in the Picnic Basket.

string.name: desc
string.value: A very spicy looking chicken. You can drag this to put it in the Picnic Basket.

string.name: desc
string.value: Rice roll filled with delicious kimchi. You can drag this to put it in the Picnic Basket.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet chocolate muffin. You can drag this to put it in the Picnic Basket.

string.name: desc
string.value: A golden packed lunch that can be put anywhere in the Picnic Basket. You can put this anywhere to complete Picnic Basket line!

string.name: desc
string.value: A good blanket is essential for a fun picnic. Take this to Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the key elements of becoming a Mesoranger. Truly only the trusting are fit to be heroes.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the key elements of becoming a Mesoranger. A nice smile can brighten up any day!

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the key elements of becoming a Mesoranger. Obviously you need to be able to rock that suit.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the key elements of becoming a Mesoranger. It helps to be smart, and be calm.

string.name: name
string.value: A Better You: Becoming a Morning Person

string.name: desc
string.value: This extremely useful and not at all patronizing self-help book will help you become a morning person. It will also help you pass the Mesoranger Action Exam.

string.name: name
string.value: A Better You: Learning to Laugh at Yourself

string.name: desc
string.value: This extremely useful and not at all patronizing self-help book will help you learn the joy of laughing at yourself. It will also help you pass the Mesoranger Action Exam.

string.name: name
string.value: A Better You: Learning to Dress Yourself

string.name: desc
string.value: This extremely useful and not at all patronizing self-help book will teach you how to put on pants, one leg at a time. It will also help you pass the Mesoranger Action Exam.

string.name: name
string.value: A Better You: Copying the Politicians

string.name: desc
string.value: This extremely useful and not at all patronizing self-help book will teach you poise and body language. It will also help you pass the Mesoranger Action Exam.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to enter the Tempest Festival and purchase items with Tempest Coins.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gourd that can capture the Tempest [Wind] that blew into Maple World. Stay logged in for 30 minutes with this in your inventory to fill it up.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gourd filled with Tempest [Wind] energy. Take it to Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gourd that can capture the Tempest [Thunder] energy that came to Maple World. Stay logged in for 30 minutes with this in your inventory to fill it up.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gourd filled with Tempest [Thunder] energy. Take it to Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Grants five Buff Freezers that allow you to keep the buffs you had before your resurrection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Grants five trips to Nero's Purrfect Purchase Palace, where you can purchase special items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Hair Color Coupon (REG).

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Royal Vacation Hair Coupon.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Mermaid Mirror that allows you get a special item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Fusion Anvil that allows you to change the appearance of equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a House Wedding Ticket.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive three Item Megaphones.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Weapon Bypass Key that allows you to equip weapons that are up to 20 levels higher than you.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive four Armor Bypass Keys that allow you to equip armors that are up to 20 levels higher than you.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive an Owl of Minerva that allows you to easily search for an item at the market.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. You can receive Maple Points that can be used to purchase cash items at the Cash Shop.

string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. You can receive Maple Points that can be used to purchase cash items at the Cash Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: Strange cube-shaped contraption needed to play the Maple Board game. Your roll determines how many steps your piece can take.

string.name: desc
string.value: Brain-wave measuring device that Bruce placed on monsters to research their behavior before the rain.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mar the Fairy's treasured leaf fan. One swing of the fan and you will feel a gentle forest freeze!

string.name: desc
string.value: Rock-hard ice from the Ice Pillar. It won't melt no matter how hot the weather is.

string.name: desc
string.value: Wind Gourd that Lisa requested for Windy the Wind Fairy. Gourd has 'To my friend Windy..." on it. It's pretty Windy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A score used by a ghost that appears in the Music Room. It has a total of 13 pages.

string.name: desc
string.value: Microphone that the principal uses during assembly.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Name tag of delinquent students that violated school rules.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cosmos flower. Stay logged in for 30 minutes with this and Cassandra will give you a Star Stamp.

string.name: desc
string.value: A set of sticks for the Game of Yut. Each game of Yut requires one set. You can stack up to #c99# in your Set-up tab, and collect up to #c80# each day.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sports drink that gets absorbed faster than water. It's made of electrolytes and stuff.

string.name: desc
string.value: A refreshingly slushy sports drink. It's got what plants and people crave!

string.name: desc
string.value: A fiery red rice cake. It's so spicy!

string.name: desc
string.value: A yummy rice roll made with many tasty ingredients.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fragrant and mouth watering Buttery Roasted Squid.

string.name: desc
string.value: Baby Moon Bunny's most cherished possession, an old picture of the moon. Hold this in your Set-up tab for 30 minutes to clear it up.

string.name: desc
string.value: Baby Moon Bunny's most cherished possession, all cleared up and ready to return.

string.name: desc
string.value: Give this to your friends, or strangers, or anybody with a sweet tooth! #cRight-click on another player to access the [Give Halloween Candy] menu#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crumpled old test paper that says, '0 points for magic knowledge. See me after class!' It looks really old.

string.name: desc
string.value: This old diary is covered in the writings of a scared young student.

string.name: desc
string.value: A slate that contains the signatures of all students who agree to the closing of the school.

string.name: desc
string.value: A puzzling Sealed Emblem that has the words, 'Everyone I miss, don't forget about the October with a full moon.'

string.name: desc
string.value: A box full of fancy party clothes. Too bad it's locked up so tight.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter supposedly full of Cygnus's Love. You really want to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Chicken tossed in a special spicy blend, then deep fried. Perfect for watching Maple Post Season.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strange purple letter dropped by one of Maple Castle's ghosts.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box full of fancy party clothes. Too bad it's locked up so tight.

string.value: A piece of a Jewel Pop Ticket. Collect enough, and you can tape them together to make a complete ticket.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold on to the Rosey Marble you got from Cassandra for 1 hour to turn it into a Heartshaker Marble. Be careful not to log out during that time or the marble will disappear.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.value: Hey, you're not the president! How'd you get in here?! Recovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.value: This tree branch looks light enough to use for a kite.

string.value: Toy Pinwheel perfect for the spring breeze. Take it to Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: Emblem of the Mir world. It has been consolidated with the Inosys world so it is no longer used. But it still remains in the heart of the people of Mir.

string.name: desc
string.value: Emblem of the Nova world. It has been consolidated with the Inosys world so it is no longer used. But it still remains in the heart of the people of Nova.

string.value: Emblem of the Cosmo world. It has been consolidated with the Inosys world so it is no longer used. But it still remains in the heart of the people of Nova.

string.name: desc
string.value: This chair is rocky, and more than a little uncomfortable.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nothing is better than sitting on the head of a lordly entity.

string.name: desc
string.value: Left over Valentine's Day chocolate pieces. These were left EVERYWHERE--the clean up is going to be a mess...

string.name: desc
string.value: The pair of Cassandraâ€™s shoes that were stolen by the Glowing Ghost. They still look new, and they are shockingly small... Like, circus-freak small.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sieve usually used to strain things. The sheer number of holes should keep the Glowing Ghost preoccupied for hours.

string.name: desc
string.value: A swanky new pair of kicks. #cThe Glowing Ghost will definitely take these away if you log out#!

string.name: desc
string.value: A gently-used pair of shoes. #cYou might lose these if you log out#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take this shiny little piece of the sky to Cassandra to receive an awesome title decorated with stars.

string.name: desc
string.value: A title given to those who loooove to Maple Chat. Increases the probability of 'bro-ing down' and 'finding homies'.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tiny, shiny seed from a Maple Tree.

string.name: desc
string.value: A title for a Maple Chat super star for reaching 100 Likability points! It has Eileen's fingerprints ALL over it. Is that a tooth mark? Geez...

string.name: desc
string.value: This dough is actually one of the Gingerbread Man's friends. Leave him in your Set-up tab for 30 minutes to complete his baking.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take this to the Gingerbread Man. Do your best not to eat it on the way there... they're friends.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] If you had a thousand of these things, and a bunch of toy soldiers, you could play king of the sea!

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Not really a rainbow, because it's missing blue AND purple. What a liar.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] So adorable, so puffy, so fat, so extremely poisonous.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Also called the 'least likely to succeed fish'.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] It's not wrong to bite one of these to see if they're genuine. Just wait until the person who gave it to you is gone.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] A can of tuna. It's not really the museum's best piece.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] It keeps doing that arm thing, only with fins.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] It just keeps spinning on its head.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] You are a fish, not a robot! Silly fish.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Extremely dangerous and environmentally friendly.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] This totally isn't just some accidental leftover from that time the janitor kicked out the power at the Marine Museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] It's so absurdly adorable, you just want to cut something.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] A famous swordsman once bought this from a guy for way too much and then had to pawn it.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] A lid from the legendary golden ramen pot. A perfect weapon for grandmas.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Can clothes be a weapon? No. That's ridiculous.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] The blacksmith who made this was terribly fond of amphibians.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Moon prism-- wait, no, wrong one.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] A Gingerbread Man so realistic, you'll probably end up eating this before it makes it to the museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Don't tell anybody, but there's an actual human heart inside that heart. Gross... yet tasty.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] She just might come to life. Hopefully she's not super evil.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] This cake is a lie. It's actually all vanilla with brown food coloring.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] There's some legend about a crow or something, but mostly these are just cookies.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] If you fight through a layer of sugar goo, you'll get to the sweet ice cream center inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Preferred by old ladies 'round the world.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] The Empress Cygnus had this commissioned, but she fell asleep before it was ready.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] A chef at a 5-star hotel made this cookie. Other cookies taste like garbage in comparison.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cage built just right for Pigmys. The little fellow in here might even be the same one the Maple Admin is looking for!

string.name: desc
string.value: Oh my gosh, did you see how cute she was?!! I THINK SHE TOUCHED MY HAND! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.value: These sugar-high monsters can't focus long enough to get out. #cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lotus will be forever yours. At least in chair form. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Why so sad, Beryl? Gelimer's not even that great. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Now you too can hang out with the guy that orders you around all the time! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A sparkly gift pouch? I'll take it!\r\nRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc

string.value: These adorable penguins are singing a Christmas carol just for you! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: It's hard to say why King Pepe has allowed himself to be a chair, but you don't second-guess comfort. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.value: Everything is better with someone else! Especially picking on singles. Recovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.value: A chair designed by the Chinese MapleStory player Xiaoshu. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bet you can't find me in Henesys! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bet you can't find me in Pantheon! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.value: Cheese, cheese, cheeeeeese! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Real comfy... \r\n#cRecovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nothing beats a day at the beach with three of Maple's pretty boys. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nothing beats a day at the beach with three of Maple's most gorgeous ladies. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: How many slimes can fit in this bubbly fish tank? \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enjoy Firefly Forest on a quiet summer night. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds. Designed by Chinese MapleStory player MAMEI#.

string.name: desc
string.value: All you have to do is sit in this chair to feel like the champion of Mu Lung Dojo. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've trained with the Mu Lung Dojo Scarecrow so often that you guys are best buds now. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Perfect for a sleeping baby. Oh, you know, for you.\r\n#cRecovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair from the Magician's Association. The perfect place to clear your head. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair made of legendary swords. Be careful when you sit so you don't get stabbed. \r\nRecovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Blinged out, mesos-style. \r\nRecovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You refuse to lose, especially to Gelimer! \r\nRecovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Just a solitary traveler, enjoying the wind and the rainbow while your fans watch from afar.\r\nRecovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nothing like splashing around in the water for the summer! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Show the world your cooking chops! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nothing like splashing around in the water for the summer! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It may look painful, but Ursus is healing you! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magnificent sunset selfie of you standing over a defeated Ursus. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You have no idea what's coming to you. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've defeated the mighty Ursus and taken over his spot. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely tree swing accompanied by playful bluebirds. \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely tree swing accompanied by playful bluebirds.\r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Good things come to those who prepare! Hongbu eventually became rich after getting help from the swallow!\r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The red Mesodizer acts as the head of the mighty giant super robot, Mesotron V! Combine all six Mesodizers #cin the proper configuration# to summon the mighty super mech!

string.name: desc
string.value: You're on top of the world! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mermaid's shelter, where the waves lap and the winds blow. A chair designed by the Chinese MapleStory player 'Xiaoshu'. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It takes a lot to get an adventurer to bathe themselves. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Andromeda is on the rise...\nRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Something to refresh you from the dry winter air! First step, drink it! You'll fee energized at once.

string.name: desc
string.value: As refined as a cup of espresso. Don't provoke it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Piping hot, and soothing to your throat.

string.name: desc
string.value: Emergency! A strawberry shortcake so delicious, it's sure to mesmerize your taste buds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Super sweet, but with a dark, rich flavor.

string.name: desc
string.value: Have a bite while chatting with a friend!

string.name: desc
string.value: The first word that comes to everyone's mind when they hear the word donut.

string.name: desc
string.value: All aboard! Oh, and the b-b-b-b-eautiful Princess Violetta... \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: All aboard! Including Gelimer! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The engineer is the most important part of the train! \r\n#cRecovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that can aggravate even the most liberal of canoodlers. \r\n#cRecovers 50 Hp and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An igloo made of solid ice. Recovers 40 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Turns every day into Valentine's Day. Recovers 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds. Sit face-to-face with someone you love to make a heart shape!

string.name: desc
string.value: A Rice Drop Soup chair for those who want to drink soup forever and ever! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: My animal friends, keep up the good work!\nRecovers 50HP and 50 MP every 10 sconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The farm owner claims this goose egg was stolen from him. You can't tell if it's real or not. Why is he obsessing over this egg?

string.name: desc
string.value: A fan that blows a cool breeze. Stay logged in for 15 minutes with this item in your inventory and you'll get a Star Stamp from Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: A thermometer bearing the mommy chicken's love. Maybe this will wake up the sleepy egg.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pot full of natural honey. Some Honey Water is in order!

string.name: desc
string.value: This is proof of your promises together. Keep this with you and stay logged in for 15 minutes to get a Star Stamp from Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Magic Pocket Pouch is closed tight. It will open after you spend 30 minutes with the pendant.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Magic Pocket Pouch opened after 30 minutes with the pendant. Talk to the spirit to get your reward.

string.name: desc
string.value: A precious seed that tells you spring is here! Hold this in your Inventory for 10 minutes and then return to Cassandra for a Star Stamp.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Magic Pocket Pouch is closed tight. It will open after you spend 3 hours as Pink Bean.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Magic Pocket Pouch has opened after spending 3 hours as Pink Bean! Open the Secret Diary to get your rewards.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Clear Fatigue Meter has become murkier after 30 minutes.

string.value: A tree branch that seems strong enough to hold up a banner.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the Maple 9th Anniversary festival. Take 30 of these to the Maple Administrator and you can enter a drawing on the MapleStory webpage for an offline 9th Anniversary event.

string.value: Restores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 sec.

string.value: Restores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Woo, this candy is rough! Who made it anyway? If nothing else, it'll keep you awake.

Showcase your wealth!
Pay 500 mesos every 2 seconds when you sit in this chair. Consumed mesos will be recorded and displayed, up to a maximum of 999,999,999. Exchanging with, trading with, or talking to an NPC will cancel the action. Recovers 1000 HP and 1000 MP every 10 seconds.

string.value: A title given to music lovers who attended at least 120 MMF shows.\r\n#c"The show never stops!"#

string.value: Rock out with DJ Pia on the MMF Henesys stage!\r\n#cDouble-click# to use. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.value: Have some Rice Cakes and kick back while feeling over the moon. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the coolest chair you'll ever sit in, and it's hot-hot-hot! At least, that's what Nue says. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The ultimate weapon in water-warfare... Unfortunately, due to safety regulations the water cannon has been disabled. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: This business savvy feline is selling his wares on the go. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds. Designed by Muzi, a player from MapleStory China.

string.name: desc
string.value: This fancy Hydrojet Chair is brought to you by Resistance technology. Recovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Witness an epic volleyball game between Cygnus, Oz, and Irena while lounging in this chair. Recovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nothing says relaxation like a blast of water to the face. Recovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you a proud Water Warrior serving the Cygnus Knights? Sit on this chair and get ready for Water Wars! Recovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.
